title: DJ Sessions: Reggae With Staying Power
teaser: Howard "Flagga" Duperly of WDNA in Miami shares new reggae artists that he says won't be one-hit wonders - from Chronixx to Sasha Dias.
contentencoded:
In this week’s installment of DJ Sessions, Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson talks to Howard “Flagga” Duperly, who hosts the Reggae Ride on WDNA public radio in Miami. He shares new reggae artists that he says won’t be one-hit wonders — from Chronixx to Sasha Dias.

  • Hear more Here & Now DJ Sessions

Songs Heard In This Segment

Chronixx, “Aint No Giving Up”

Chronixx, “Access Granted”

[Youtube]

Sasha Dias, “Sometimes Loves Just Ain’t Enough”

[Youtube]

Sasha Dias, “Questions”

Terry Linen, “Not Use to You Like That”

G. Cole, “Ocho Rios”

Guest

  • Howard “Flagga” Duperly, host of the Reggae Ride on WDNA public radio in Miami.
